chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: Bukama Marenellin, p. 14—Lan's teacher, one of the original 20 men charged with the task of carrying the infant prince of Malkier to safety when the nation was overrun; he is the only one still alive. Bluff and broad, he is taller than most men, almost as tall as Lan. His hair is solid gray, which he wears cut to the shoulder according to Malkieri tradition, held back by the hadori, a thin braided leather cord. He has blue eyes.
